title: Honor level up
body:
How does honor xp work? and how do I level up my honor?

I'm currently level 2 and have been playing for so long, getting honors and all my team honors most of the time. It says I get honor xp but I'm still not level 3 yet and I really want that ward skin.

(I used to be level 5 got chat restricted and that dropped me to level 1 ??!! but I leveled up to 2 and now it doesn't seem to increase any more)

replies.body: There's no visible meter, but as long as you are playing you will continue to accrue honor.  It can go up faster with honorable play as well as receiving honors.  Just keep at it, and you'll get there again though it may not be enough enough time for the current season.

I counted how many it took from level 2 to 3 for me.  It was 118 honors.  18 of them were MVP(3 from non-friend), 70 2 honors (from non-friends), and then 80% of the rest were flairs(one non-friend) and 20% from friends :)  Hope that helps <3{{champion:16}}
